entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain showers and flurries beginning in the morning then changing to periods of snow late in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 2:17 PM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023
